summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2014, to April 30, 2014. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating financial activity related to the account during this period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 34S Park Avenue, NYC, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for a Deutsche Bank account from April 1, 2014, to April 30, 2014.
The beginning balance on April 1, 2014, was $402,032.00.
An incoming money transfer from Bear Stearns Asset Management, Inc. was recorded on April 8, 2014, for $6,182.66.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2014, was $408,234.66.
